note.p: Landowner and magistrate. Lord of the manor of Grays, Essex, and responsible for its development in the 1860s. Lived at Hyde Abbey, Winchester, Hampshire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1212/56/36)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 May 2020)
W. R. Powell et al. eds. 1983, pp. 36–56
